title: MSI 2015 Commentators
body: Jus in case you missed it you can go straight to commentary right after the end of the 1st match today and listen to the mid-right commentator call the raptor camp the Rape Camp! Gave me a laugh in which they go to replays but a hot mic is still on and you can hear more commentators sound silly. Enjoy

replies.body: That's dCrumbzz, former Jungler of Dignitas.
